availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James K. Anderson (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Armstrong. Father of Rebecca Anderson and Peter Anderson. Married to Eliza Jane Eden Anderson in Bath County in January 1853. Father of William S. Anderson. Married to Eliza Jane Ewing Anderson in Bath County on May 1, 1855. Father of Putnam Anderson, Margaret Anderson, and Robert Anderson. Farmer in Bath County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Bath County in 1860.
